abstract: Lawyers for terrorism suspect Abu Zubaydah, who is being held at the Guantanamo Bay Naval Base prison facility, file a case against Lithuania at the European court of Human Rights over torture and secret detention at a Central Intelligence Agency-run site in that country.
snippet: Lawyers for Abu Zubaydah, a terrorism suspect being held at Guantánamo Bay, filed a case against Lithuania on Thursday over torture and secret detention at a C.I.A.-run site in Lithuania.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Abu Zubaydah, a terrorism suspect being held at Guantánamo Bay, filed a case against Lithuania on Thursday over torture and secret detention at a C.I.A.-run site in Lithuania.

headline.main: Lithuania: Terrorism Suspect Files Case Over C.I.A. Rendition Claim
headline.print_headline: Lithuania: Terrorism Suspect Files Case Over C.I.A. Rendition Claim
